And then insert those in the middle place by a right section according to the length of the body, and extract what is gathered of the fetid and corrupted humors.
E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then cure the wound with the cure of the other wounds in which you wish to be healed so that the vessels which annoy one of the two genitals, because it is not bad for that.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if it happens vit to all the vessels, then it is necessary that the testicles be extracted or that the testicles be tied by that with the vessels, so that it be deprived of all nourishment by the incision of the vessels, and that they be established, or that they be tied so that it be not a benefit to those.
Capitol .lxv.	Chapter .lxv.
De la cura de hernia entestinal.	Of the cure of intestinal hernia.
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The advent of this hernia is by a section that ends in the cap extended over the belly of part of the angles of the miracle of the belly, for that descending the bowels of that rupture ad to some of the bowels.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	And this rupture is either of the cap or of excision of it, and these two species happen for many causes: either percussion, or by seizures, or by clamor, or by elevation of any heavy cause, or by similarities.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	And the sign of it, when it is by extension of the cap, is that it happens little by little in long time, and it does not happen suddenly, and it is an abscess equal within ves the preon for so that the cap comprehends the bowel.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	And the sign of him is when he is by section of the head, because at the beginning he makes a violent pain suddenly; and is pus different appearing after the code propdana appearing, and this is by the exit of the intestine, and the body of it to the sides of the head.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	And sometimes it is forgotten with the intestine the cloth, and this intestinal hernia is called zirbal.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	And sometimes it is made with flatulence, and sometimes it runs in the intestine wound, and here it is retained, and this is a great harm to the patient, and sometimes it makes a bad pain and more when it is pressed.
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in the cure of the kinds of this disease with iron there is fear, because whoever is to be avoided the catching in that.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	And the way of the operation of that is that you command the patient to reduce the intestine with his hand to the sides of his cavity if he obeys his return, and then he is laid on his back between your hands, and raise the legs of him.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	And then stretch the cord which is the cord of the testicles to the sides below, and cut the cord of the testicles all along; and then fix in two lips of the section uncis according to that you indicated to open the section with those.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the section according to the quantity that to you is possible that of that the fluid be forgotten.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	And then scrape that skin which is below the cord of the testicles, until that the white hard skull of each part be discovered.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Now you introduce your finger in that which is the testicle, in that which is between white skull, the one which is below the cord of the fluid, and between the skull second, and loosen with that adherence that is in the part behind the fluid.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	And then with your hand the cord of the testicles to the sides above, and thus extend the white skull on your left hand, and elevate the fluid with the skull to the part of the section; and command the minister that extend the fluid upwards and you loosen the adherence that is behind with solution complied.
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And search with your fingers that there be no cause of the intestine enveloped in the white hard skull.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	But if you find of it any cause, then you peel that to the belly below.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	And then you take a needle in which be faithful thick made of x threads, and introduce that through the rear of the skull, which is below the cord of the testicles, which is called section; and then cut the extremities which emerge from the thread until they be four threads, and then compose some of them on some figure in manner of cross; and tie with that the skull of which we have said that is below the cord of the testicles with strong binding of two parts.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	And then wrap the extremities of the threads and tie those with vehement binding until some of the vessels that nourish those no more can transmit any cause so that from here no abscess occur.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	And pause another binding according to for the first binding, long from it less three fingers; and then these two bindings leave from the skull which is below the cord of the testicles the quantity of the greatness of the finger, and cut all the remaining according to roundness, and take out of it the fluid.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And then cut in the part below of the cord of the testicles by section of which runs blood and heals thus as we have recommended in that which we have said.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	And then administer wool immersed in oil, and pause in the wound; and administer the binding which we have recommended (and sometimes the white skull is cauterized, which we have said near the incision fear of blood flow, because many times those occur) and leave the binding until that by itself it falls.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	But if the catching of him is late, then of water caused be embroiled, and pause on that until it falls according to that we have said.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the wound with the other cure of the wounds until that it be healed.
Capitol .lxvi.	Chapter .lxvi.
De hernia ventosa.	Of  ventosa hernia.
En aquesta hernia no e vist alcu que sia estat ardit sus la curacio de lu am ferr.	In this hernia no one has been seen to have been bold on the cure of it with iron.
E les primiers diyssero que es fayta ayssi cum havem recomtat en la hernia que es am vi; la qual es que tu lies les vayssels aprop la seccio sobre aquela am fecilitat de lu; e aprop secca en le mieg loc en enviro le apostema am aquo que obro aquel, entro que caian les vayssels.	And the first said that it is made as we have recommended in the hernia that is with vi; which is that you lie the vessels near the section on that with facility of it; and then dry in the middle place in sending the abscess with that which opened it, until that the vessels fall.
E cura la plagua segon que havem dit entro que sia sanada.	And cure the wound according to that we have said until that it be healed.
Capitol .lxvii.	Chapter .lxvii.
De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Of the disruption that is made in the  anguonars.
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Sometimes there is a rupture in the anguonars as we have said, and emerges the place.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not leave to the genitals any cause of the intestines to the genitals; and if they leave, that is few; and return them in all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys.	But if it is prolonged the time with that, it is adjusted fissure in the skull until that descends the intestine in the skull; and occurs that by the extension of the skull which is in the anguonars as we have said, the cause is that the skull is extended, and then it is softened and the place is putrid and emerges.
E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	And the care of him is by cautery as it is preceded by the narration of him.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	And some times it is cured with iron in this manner: and that the patient lies on his two between your hands, and then dry the place of the rupture of the abscesses emerging with a section according to the quantity of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	And then strengthen the white cloth that is under the loincloth while it is uncovered.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	And then take the ray and place it on the prominent place of the cloth, and press it to the front of the belly.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then sew the two prominent places on the end of the ray of the cloth, and adjust with the suture one of them with the other.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	And then extract the end of the ray, and do not cut the cloth at all, nor extend the bowel, nor any other cause as you have now learned in the cure of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	And then cure that with the cure of the plagues, and as you cut the threads, purify that and restore the plague while it is consolidated; because the cloth is contracted and the prominence of rupture is not adjusted.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	And cautery is better in this place, because it is more proper to health.
Capitol .lxviii.	Chapter .lxviii.
De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Of softening the scrotum of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Many times the scrotum of the testicles in some men is softened because the flesh that is between it is softened, and it is fed by the regard of it.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	Therefore, it is necessary for him who is asked in the cure of it to make the patient lie on his two, and cut all the scrotum which is softened on the natural scrotum; and then adjust the two lips with the suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you want, sew at the beginning the superfluity of the softened scrotum with three stitches or four and with firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	And then cut between the sutures; and then cure by the cure of the other plagues while it is healed and the threads fall.
Capitol .lxix.	Chapter .lxix.
De castracio.	Of castration.
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Know that castration in our law is exempted, but for the reason it is told to me that I remember it in this book; and it is not necessary the remembrance of it except for two ways, of which one is so that it is in the science of the physician when he is asked about it, that he knows the cure of it to whom it happens; and the other way is that we many times have need of castration of other animals for our usefulness for those, as well as of goats, and of sheep, and of pigs, and of similar animals.
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And therefore I say that castration is done in two ways: either by attrition, or by fissure to section.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	But in that which is done by attrition, the way of the operation is that we make the beast to be put in hot water until its genitals are softened and are limp and that they hang.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	And then take those with your hand while they are soft and do not appear after the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	But in castration done by fissure and section, cover that you have the beast and press the scrotum of its testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	And then lie the suspensory, and cut over each testicle with a section between two testicles processed.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	And then cut those that you will have each excoriated.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave on those of the cloth any cause, but the subtle cloth which is over the vessels.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	And this manner of castration is better the one done by attrition, because attrition firmly leaves no cause of the testicles for which the beast desires coyt.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then cure the plague while it is healed.
Capitol .lxx.	Chapter .lxx.
De la cura de hermafrodozia.	Of the cure of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men is according to two ways: one is that it appears in that which sees the space in the scrotum of testicles, in which one figure as the  female part in which it is felt.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes from that cord urine the which is in the scrotum of the testicles.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	But in women it is a species: and it is that the female organ on the  pith is as two testicles of a man a little of all diminished at the forward part as the prepuce of a man and two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	And the cure is of three species: of two of the men and of one species of the women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	And it is that cover that you cut those flesh adjusted while it flees the  impression of it, and then that you cure those with the cure of the other plagues.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	And in the second species of men of which yeys urine the which is in the scrotum of the testicles, there is no cure nor operation in it.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter .xxi.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of lenting and of prominent flesh for causes of the women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	Lenting is very often adjusted on natural causes while it is stressed and is made to be seen; and sometimes it is magnified in some women so much that it spreads as in men and serves during coitus.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, you must have the superfluity of the liquid with your hand or in a cup and cut it.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And in the last incision, mainly in the front of the root, so that no flow of blood occurs.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	And then care for it with the cure of the plagues until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	Mays carn nascuda es carn that nays in the horrifici of the mayre entro that umple aquel, and fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa of coa (and for aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove that nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro that sia sanada.
Capitol .lxxii.	Chapter .lxxii.
De curacio de alratica.	Of the cure of alratica.
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Alratica is that the conh of the woman is not perforated, or is the trauc petit.
E es o natural o accidental.	And it is natural or accidental.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	Accidental is by illness which has preceded, and that is done either by flesh not well-adjusted or by a subtle or thick ciph.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	And it is done either in the front of the mother, or in the sides of her, or in the upper part of her, or in the lower part of her, and forbids coit and pregnancy and childbirth, and very much forbids menstruation.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	And the knowledge of that is done by regarding the metrona, if the oppilacio is apparent, proper; but if it is not apparent, then you seek that with your fingers or with the ray.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	But if the oppilacio is by a subtle ciph, and it is proper to the two labia, then you cut and disrupt that.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And it is that you place on the two labia pulvils, and then you place your fingers indicated from both sides at once.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	And the woman be upon her back, her thighs extended, and then extend the two labia with force so that that subtle ciph be broken and the oppilacio be opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	And then take wool and soak it in oil and place that over the area, and wash with warm water every day so that the incised area not be consolidated.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the ciph is thick and thick, then it is that you cut that with a spatula or with a leaf of myrtle.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	But if the oppilacio is by carnada, then suspend that with a cup, and cut that.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And be with you the medicines that make cease the flow of blood by biting, such as ahacatia, and dragon's blood, and incense, adjusted with album of egg.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	And then administer a wide lead pipe so that the plague not be consolidated lightly.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	And keep that for some days and administer calgua of li sec.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then be cured with the other cure of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	And sometimes it happens in the mother's nativity of other carns, and then it is that you cut according to this manner.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if this is by a carbuncle, the carbuncle which is in the mother not be done contrarietat with iron in any manner.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter .lxxiii.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	Of the cure of hemorrhoids and of tail and of red botor that happens in the conh of the women.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids so appear from the orifices of many veins into which of those corro blood continuously; and as so old hemorrhoids and are made theyls.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	And already I have said in the division the species of those and their signs, and say so those that receive cure and those that do not receive cure.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore I say that hemorrhoids and theyls when so in the front of the mother and do not appear to the sentiment, then in those not be done cure with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	But those which so in the orifice of the mother over which cats sentiment, so those which are cured.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And it is that you put the woman in a major frieze and then extend the theyl with the forceps, or with rough cloth, and cut those with the razitz.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	And then pulverize over those of the fluxes of the blood of one of the incised powders biting, such as acacia and similar to those.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And then enpellesca her feet for an hour, and then place that in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if it perseveres the fluxes of the blood, then do that sezer in decoction of sumat and of the skins of millegranas and of guals and of similar things.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	And then take flour of barley and comfiys that with honey and vi agre and make a plaster with water over the back of her.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	And if the blood is abscindit, bo es; and if not, do adhere with two ventozas, and to the nipples ses escarificatio.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then take wool and submergeys that with juice of coriander or with juice of arnagloza or with juice of guarravier with vi pentit and make adhere to the place; and then cure the place with enguentz until it is sanat.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	But athyl rog which is of aspre regarding, it is that you cut that which to you appear of that according to that I have said in theyl engualment.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And care for that within that is healing.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter .lxxiv.
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Of the perforation of the eyssedura  accident in the womb.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Many kinds of abscesses happen in the womb, as well as boils and abscesses, and ulcers and buboes and carbuncles and fistulas, hemorrhoids and fissures, and boils and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	And I have already said these ailments and the kinds of them and their symptoms, and their cures in the division.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	And I want to say in this treatise about an abscess that comes in the womb when it is of abscesses that are healing, and if you want to know in what manner the operation of it is done with iron.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Therefore, consider if the pain of the abscess at its beginning is acute with percussion and phlegm and fever, and sometimes that redness and if it catz upon that feeling, then do not cut with perforation of it, and care for it with that which helps on the maturation until the acuteness of the accidents ceases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then have you make the woman lie on a cot that has two cots; and recline upon her two and adjust her feet to the part below the belly, and her thighs be spread, and place her arms below her shoulders, and tie her with a band to that which is convenient.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	And then the midwife follows from the right side and administers the instrument with which the orifice of the womb is opened, the form of which will come in those causes that will be done afterward.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And then when you want to administer this instrument, you put it with the ray on the preon of the womb of the woman, and that which from the instrument enters into the womb be no more than the preon of the womb and lead the patient.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	But if the instrument is larger than the preon of the womb, then have you put powders on the texture of the preon of the womb so that it be prohibited the instrument of all instrument in the preon of the womb.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	And have you put the verdigris that runs in the instrument from the side above and that the minister holds the instrument and revolves the verdigris until the orifice of the womb is opened.

A ensenhar las matronas en qual manieyre les enbrios bius sian medicatz quan yeysso segon figura no-natural.	To teach the midwives in what manner the living embryos should be medicated when they are second figure unnatural.
Necessaria causa es que la matrona conogua en le comensament la figura del enfantament natural per senhals de lu, e es que quan tu vezas la femna expremar a las partidas dejos e desira odorar le ayre, e sobre aquo es enleujada per aquo que sobre ela es del part, e festina le eyssiment del enbrio, lahoras sapias que aquest part es segon figura natural, e es l’eyssiment de lu sobre le sieu cap, e la segondina am aquel o suspensa o pendent del ombelic. De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you care for the dead fetus as we have said in the division of the medicine, and it is not expelled outside, and you are forced to use the operation with your hand, then consider if the woman is of sound virtue and is not suffering from any of the accidents for which she is feared to be in danger.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then the woman should be laid down on her back, with her head inclined downwards, and her legs elevated.

E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And convenient places in this: therefore you consider if the fetus is prepared that descends upon its head, and then you place the hooks in the heels of it, or in the neck, or in the mouth, or in the palate, or behind the beard, or in the fork of it, or in the places proper of the back, or behind the hypochondria.

Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And be careful to every part, so that the movement of it be alleviated as it is done during the eradication of it.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And consider in it that which is between them that the extension be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then the midwife anoints some of her fingers with oil and introduces them with gentleness and revolves with those that are retained.

Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde. E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And so you should do in the other hand and in the two feet.

But if the head of the fetus is large, or there is a constriction in its movement, or there is water adjusted in the head of it, then the midwife should introduce between the fingers the pointed spatula and split the head and extract the water, or what discharges that with an instrument which is named "alundat", the form of which will come with the forms of the other instruments in the chapter which is after this.

E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the bowels of the belly are suppurated or are in it hydrophic, then you must pierce that so that the moisture which is in it flows out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the thing is on their feet, then the attraction of it is lighter and the direction of it to the mouth of the mother is lighter.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels. E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer plasters; and follow the patient in waters that soften and moisten.

E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it is incised in pieces, and it is extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And you must not leave any cause of the second coming.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed your whole operation, then administer the water that we have said of the cure in the abscesses caused by the ones which happened to the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if there occurs a flux of blood, then send them down in astringent waters and administer the other cure.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose belly was a dead fetus, and then on that very fire another pregnancy, and then a dead fetus is the other.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to me a long time ago an abscess in his navel; and it inflated so that a fire opened, and it began to throw out pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to the cure of him, and medicated him for a long time, and the plague was not consolidated.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I put on him some causes of strong attraction plasters, and extracted from him a bone, and after passing some days, I extracted another bone; and I was too amazed, as in the belly there were no bones.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought that they were of the bones of the dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Therefore, I continued to treat the abscess, and extracted from him many bones, the woman existing in her usual dispositions, and already living in that manner for a long time, cured of him a little pus.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I do not affirm that this is strange, but that in this there is science and help to what the physician artifices with his hand for the cure administers.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of the instruments that are necessary to extract the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	Form of the forceps with which the mother is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of the stretcher in which the blades are inserted, to which are inserted two forceps in two extremities of two feet.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	But nevertheless this forceps must be more subtle than the stretcher, and be made of either ivory or wood of beech.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And its width of each shaft is two fingers and the margin of each one is one finger, and the length of each one is a palm and a half; and in the middle place of two shafts are two adjustments of that same shaft, which are already closed, of which the length is the majority of a palm and a little less, and the width of each one is two fingers, or a little less.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two adjustments are inserted into the mouth of the mother so that it is opened with those when you revolve the two prescribed forceps.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another form similar to that more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It is made of ivory or beech shafts according to the semblance of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But nevertheless, at the extremity of it are two adjustments as we have seen, and the length of those adjustments is about a palm, and the width of each one is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And as you want to open the mother with those, then you make the woman lie on the bed with her feet dangling, opening what is between her thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument as you do with forceps, according to the amount that you want of the opening of the mouth of the mother so that the midwife makes it as you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertigo that the ancients say:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of impellent which is pushed by the foot:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of dizziness which is contained by the great head
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is assembled like forceps, which has teeth at the extremity, thus sometimes, and some times it is made long thus like forceps according to this form, thus sometimes, which has teeth thus like teeth of a saw with which it is incised and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of dizziness little:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of a nail having a spine:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of a nail having two spines:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps which has teeth of a lock with which the head of the fetus is contained:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a spatula having two extremities with which the head is severed:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two spatulas wide:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are exercised, and when more are multiplied the species of that and are prepared the artificers, as much as is lighter to their operation and more of them the men by their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And in works of those instruments already whatever it is of them you should prepare, because the necessity of those is inexcusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the secondine.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the secondine is retained in childbirth, then you command the woman to retain her breath, and then make that stir with a condition, and strengthen your hand over the mouth of her and over her nostrils, and if by this it is pushed out, it is good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a wool and perforate in the cover a hole and place in that herbs inside the mouth of the mother, thus like calament and rue and anise and chamomile and sicados arabic and cinnamon and santaurea.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are submerged in water in the wool, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a cannula of cane in the mouth of the mother, and keep that inside until the vapor comes to the cavity of the mother.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make that stir as we have said, and the secondine is thrown out with velocity.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	But if remaining after this cure and it is not pushed out, then you command the midwife to submerge her left hand in sesame oil or in a mixture of althea, and then introduce that into the vagina and with that she feels the secondine, and when she has found it, then she takes it and extends it little by little. But if it is annexed in the perineum of the mother, then she introduces her hand as we have recounted, and when she has found the secondine, she extracts it little by little according to rectum so that the mother does not feel the violent traction.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	It is necessary that it be changed to the right and left sides with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then it should be adjusted in the amount of traction, because it will obey and avoid adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mouth of the mother is constricted, we have already recounted the cure with stirring and with medication of the wool with herbs.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if it is not thrown out with all the causes that we have recounted, then guard that you do not tire over that in iteration of abstraction, but rather that what is emitted from it to the mouth of the mother lies to the cushion of the woman, and then christenize that with enguent and tetrafarmacon; because that will make it to rot that then after some days and it will be dissolved and it will be thrown out.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it may be possible, it is elevated bad odor to the head, and to the stomach, and what you read the woman; and then it is necessary that fumigations and conveniences be administered to it.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	But some of the Ancients already are espoused sub-fumigation of nazitort and of dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Form of instrument with which the woman is sub-fumigated of the retention of menstruation and of the secondine:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It is made of lead or of bronze.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And it is placed the subtle extremity in the vagina and the broad extremity over the fire, and the sub-fumigation is placed over the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep that inside until that sub-fumigation is consumed and iterate another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of cure of the unperforated anus of the child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born and the anuses of them are not perforated, those which already have a subtle and oily cicatrix.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then it is necessary to the midwife that with her finger she perforates that cicatrix; and if not, perforate it with a sharp spatula, and guard that it does not touch the lacert.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then place over that wool infused in wine and oil; and then cure that with enguent until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear that it is oily, then place in the hole a cannula for many days, and remove it when the child will want to defecate.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And already accidies suppuration of the anus for consolidation of plague or of abscess; then it is necessary that that consolidation be incised, and then it be cured with what we have said of the cure and of the lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of cure of the fistulas that come from the bowels.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that develop in the area below the navel and the size of which develop near the anus or in the space between the buttocks.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or a lump.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And since that lump is ancient and flows from the moist, white, or subtle pus, and sometimes from these fistulas, some penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those that penetrate are known by what is emitted from them by egress and by windiness; and sometimes the patient feels the egress, and it is strongly emitted from them.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And sometimes from these fistulas, some penetrate into the space into the bladder, and into the meat of the vagina; and some penetrate into the junction of the thigh and into the root of the groin.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in which a fistula penetrating into the anus and not penetrating is known, is that you put your finger into the anus, and you introduce a subtle probe of lead or iron into the fistula when there is no turgescence.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is turgescence in that, then introduce into that a subtle probe of lead or horsehair until you feel the probe or hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel that at all, nor do you proceed from the tract any cause of egestion or worm or windiness, thus as we have said, then you know that it is not penetrating, and then you turn to the cure.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the vagina, then the significance of it is the emission of urine from that and prohibition of it so that the place may be consolidated with medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the junction of the thigh or into the groin and causes pain in the circuit, then the sign of it is that the probe penetrates here if there is no turgescence into the groin, and causes pain in the circuit of the area; and that from it there is pus always; and that it does not benefit in that medication, nor is it consolidated with an enema.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas, there is no cure for all, and the cure of those is the labor and vanity of the physicians over which they are based.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in that which is not penetrating and not ancient, healing with iron is expected according to what I tell you, and what I have already said and proved.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is that the patient lies between your hands on his two and elevates his legs into them, the thighs leaning towards his belly, and then introduce a probe of lead, or of iron if there is turgescence in the fistula, until you know the place where the probe penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if that feels the patient around the anus, then cover that when you introduce your finger into the anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you feel in your finger the probe already by itself penetrate, or another that you feel between your finger and that skin or flesh, then you know certainly that that is penetrating; and therefore do not work on that, because it is not in that healing, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But however, some say that it is healed in some men tart.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And of the medication by which is expected help in it is that you ignite a subtle cautery according to the size of the fistula, as it is preceded, and introduce that ignited into the fistula until it reaches around the anus; and then repeat that two or three times until you know that all those carns adjusted fistulas that are like a feather quill of a bird are already cauterized.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then cure that with poultices wrapped in border until they can all those carns that are cauterized, and then cure that with medicines the flesh generating and consolidating, and if it is healed, well is; and if not, then it is not healed in any time by other cure.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters, and does not penetrate into your finger which is in the anus, and between that and the probe which is always a suspicion of flesh or skin, and sometimes the fistula in that which it seizes the surface of the pudendum, then dry the pudendum from the beginning of the fistula, and you see it drying with the probe, and in the fistula until the section reaches the place where the extremity of the probe reaches, and by the probe is liberated and caught.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then purify those fistulous carns which are assembled like a feather quill of a bird and do not remain from them any cause.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	But if flux of blood sometimes comes between you and your operation when you were inserting those carns, then the best that may be and of the lighter pus instrument is to cauterize with fire or with acute medicine, because cauterizing with fire adjusts good two habits: it is the cauterization of those adjusted carns, and the abscess of the blood excretion of the humidities.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then cure that with poultices wrapped in border or in caus trissat until the place gets brac, and then cure the plague with enemas of firm flesh generating and consolidating.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And so medicines in which there is styptication and excretion; when then it is restored already it is healed and you do not fear iteration.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	But if the fistula already reaches into the perineum of the anus and is elongated from it to the surface of the body, then introduce your finger into the anus and inquire with that.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And therefore if you feel the probe and between you and it is always flesh or skin, and it is proper to penetration, then there is no operation in it but according to your trust and hope.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This cause is administered in him in one of three ways: either that you cauterize that as we have said; or that you reduce that while you obtain the cavity of it so that it is possible for you to introduce the instruments and the proper cure; and do not proceed to move it by section so that you do not injure the ligament containing the tail, and that it occurs on the patient as if of the will of the egistio; and then cure it with what we have said that it is very strong sir; or that you lengthen that veil and cleanse that pus that dries that inside the buttock, as we have said, or by probe or other instrument of sharp extremity, and then cleanse those carbuncled flesh which are in the section within the one you can by percutaneous; and then strive to make the restoration of the whole plague by section, and if the orifice of pus above is not consolidated, and the fistula remains open in the part of the buttock, and pus is light for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And in some cases the fistula is finished in this way: it is when you introduce the probe into the fistula, and it is in the latz of the buttock around the surface of the body with the codina and on the edge of the buttock, then take a probe of perforated extremity, which is as if a needle to prepare the hearts according to this form:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	And introduce it into that faithful envelope of v fiels or around them; and then introduce the probe with a faithful into the fistula until you obtain its cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	But if it is penetrating in the edge of the buttock near the end, then you extract the probe from that tract so that you introduce your finger into the buttock; and extract the extremity of the probe and adjust the two extremities at the same time, and tighten each one, and leave it for a day or two, and when you have incised the probe deeper into the flesh, tighten well that inside so that those flesh which are between the two extremities of the probe and that they close.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And then cure the plague until it is consolidated and healed.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the orifice of the fistula is not penetrating, then make it penetrate, in whatever way it is prepared for you, so that it is not in the preon, because it is not to you that you do this so that you do not injure the ligament; and then do it with that inside so that it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the spatum spinos with which the fistula is split: the curvature of which is very sharp and the other part is not sharp, so that you do not injure what is not necessary, as sometimes.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Of suture of hemorrhoids in which blood runs in the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids are in two ways, that is, they are between the buttock seeming like that of carbuncles, or that those are like the fat of rasim.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And of those are small and large, and that the blood runs from those always and is one, and are many, and are outside the buttock, and in the extremities of it.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	But however, those that are outside the buttock are according to the few humidity, of which water citrina or a little blood with a continuous body runs, and are according to the color of the body.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the cure of that which is inside the buttock is that you command the patient to lie down and to express it while the buttock is loose and the hemorrhoids appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you take it and suspend with hooks or what you have those with your nail, and then you cut those by their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the hooks are not held in those because of the humidity of them and their softening, then take those with rough cloth or with a stick or with wool fleece, and extract those with your fingers, and then cut those and pulverize over them some powders caudas near the incision, so that they are applied to those in place of cauterization; or cauterize those according to what is preceded in the chapter of cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then cure those with the other cure until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the buttock does not obey egress, then christenize the patient with a christery in which the bite is small, and wash it with that water that is in the buttock and that obeys egress lightly when the patient is expressed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are outside the buttock, then the cause of them is lighter, and it is that you take those with your nail, or that you take those with a hook, and cut those, and then cure those with the water that we have said until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And that one who has incised, cover that you administer suture of them according to this way: take a faithful and introduce it into a needle and then extract the hemorrhoids to the upper parts, and make it penetrate with the needle in the root of the other part, and enclose the two extremities of the faithful in the part below the needle, and so it is laterally; and tighten the hemorrhoid with a strong structure, and then untie the faithful and extract the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all, and leave one of them untied, so that the superfluity of blood runs from that one.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And then pause over the buttock cloth infused in rose oil or in cerot; and pause that over the buttock and command the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then leave that until it dries; and when it is dried, cure those with ointments or with other cure until it is healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	On the cure of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Boils often occur due to the dryness of a wound or due to the constriction of nature.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And since old remedies are not effective in this medicine, when you see them with the point of a spatula or your fingernail, while they are moist and the pus of them is being extracted, you prohibit them from solidifying; and then cure them once they are solidified.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then you open them with a sharp incision, the first one when blood comes and they are excoriated; and then cure them once they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	On the cure of hemorrhoids, this is the key.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that hemorrhoids, this is the key, and it is not if not a knot rounded according to the color of the body, resembling a key's head, and it is made in all the body and mostly in the parts below the feet and in the buttocks, and because of these pains you must treat the ailment.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	And therefore, when you see it that is in the circuit of the key, you must cut it with forceps or a knife, and eradicate it from its root; and then cure that.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you want, cauterize the one that precedes in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	But warts are a small, rough, fistulous, round eminence on the surface of the body, and many times they appear in the most of the children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And the cure for them is that you extend and cut that, or that you tighten that with a thread or a needle, while it is being cauterized.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you want, cauterize that, according to what we have said, with fire or with an acute medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And once they are eradicated, both forwards and backwards, with the instrument which I have told you about.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	But a wart is a small, rough, or fistulous eminence on the surface of the body, going into the flesh, and when the flesh touches it, it is felt in it, resembling a bite from an ant, and it is made around the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	And the cure for it is that you take a quill of eagle or of vulture, and it is strong, and place that over the wart while you contain it with the circle of the quill in the parts of it; and then you roll your hand with the quill while you cut that which is in the circuit of the wart, and place it in the flesh of the skin, and that you eradicate the wart from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you want, make that with a quill of iron or of steel, according to this form:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	Let the part above the needle be drawn to subtlety, blunt (so it is not perforated), enveloped so that on the finger the perception of it be ablated and the revolution of that.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you want, cauterize the wart according to what is said before in the cauterization of the aethyl in the chapter of cauteries.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	On the forms of the instruments that are administered to give christening.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Sometimes christening is made of silver or of laton or of melted or hammered iron; and sometimes it is made of those instruments small and large according to those to whom they are administered, that the one that is administered in the cure of the small children be small; and of those whose buttocks are bruised or sore, the christenings of those be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of the large and few christening:
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the needle of it above in which the bag is tied be wide according to this manner; and there be a distinction in it where the bag is tied as many times.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the extremity of it below, which is inserted into the anus, be blunt (so it is not open) very long, extending to subtlety; and in one of the sides of it be two holes, and in the other side one hole, and be the width of the hole according to the thickness of the rays and thicker a little.
